bill_title: to require counseling before certain surgical procedures are performed.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to require counseling before certain surgical procedures are performed. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. Before a surgeon performs a surgical procedure on a partner in a marriage for the purpose of preventing the birth of children in the future, the surgeon or another person permitted under Title 36 to provide counseling services shall counsel both marriage partners together concerning the surgery. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
